    • Method Detail

      • closeGame

        public void closeGame(MiniGame game)

        Closes the given game and all underlying resources.

      • joinGame

        public <P> boolean joinGame(MiniGame game,
                            P player,
                            Team team)

        Lets the given player leave join the given game. Optional can the prefered team be specified but the team can still change because of arena settings. Does nothing if the player is already in a Game.

        See Also:
        player, game, team

      • leaveGame

        public <P> void leaveGame(MiniGame game,
                          P player)

        Lets the given player leave the given game. Does nothing if the player is not in the game.

        See Also:
        player, game

      • spectateGame

        public <P> void spectateGame(MiniGame game,
                             P player)

        Lets the given player leave spectate the given game. Does nothing if the player is already spectating a Game.

        See Also:
        player, game

      • onDraw

        public void onDraw(MiniGame game)

        Gets called when the given game ends with a draw.

        See Also:
        game

      • handle

        public void handle(MiniGame game,
                   int ticks)

        Handles the game actions per tick. ticks parameter shows the amount of ticks 0 - 20 for each second.

        See Also:
        ticks

      • switchToNextMatchTime

        public void switchToNextMatchTime(MiniGame game)

        Actives the next match time. Closes the match if no match time is available.
